org.retal.logiweb.controller

Class AdminPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.retal.logiweb.controller.AdminPageController

  • public class AdminPageController
extends Object
    Controller for administrator page and all possible actions on that page.
    Author:
    Alexander Retivov
